name: n8n-nodes-base.twitterTool
semantic_context: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Post, like, and search tweets, send messages, search users, and add users to lists
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource

options.name: Direct Message
options.description: Send a direct message to a user

options.name: List
options.description: Add a user to a list

options.name: Tweet
options.description: Create, like, search, or delete a tweet

resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

user.name: user
user.description: The user you want to search
user.ai_hint: The user you want to search

text.name: text
text.description: The text of the status update. URLs must be encoded. Links wrapped with the t.co shortener will affect character count
text.ai_hint: The text of the status update. URLs must be encoded. Links wrapped with the t.co shortener will affect character count

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: sortOrder
options.description: The order in which to return results

options.name: startTime
options.description: Tweets before this date will not be returned. This date must be within the last 7 days if you don't have Academic Research access.

options.name: endTime
options.description: Tweets after this date will not be returned. This date must be within the last 7 days if you don't have Academic Research access.

options.name: tweetFieldsObject
options.description: The fields to add to each returned tweet object. Default fields are: ID, text, edit_history_tweet_ids.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

list.name: list
list.description: The list you want to add the user to
list.ai_hint: The list you want to add the user to

noticeLocation.displayName: Locations are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations
noticeLocation.name: noticeLocation

noticeAttachments.displayName: Attachements are not supported due to Twitter V2 API limitations
noticeAttachments.name: noticeAttachments

searchText.name: searchText
searchText.description: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.
searchText.ai_hint: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

me.name: me
me.description: Whether you want to search the authenticated user

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'list'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /additionalFields.location == '' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeLocation'
IF /additionalFields.attachments == '' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticeAttachments'
IF resource == 'tweet' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetDeleteId'
IF operation == 'like' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetId'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchText'
IF resource == 'tweet' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'tweet' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'retweet' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetId'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'searchUser' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF me == True THEN HIDE parameter 'user'
IF operation == 'searchUser' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'me'
